title: Royal British Legion Centre for Blast Injury Studies Annual Networking Event with Imperial College Trauma Initiative
desc: The Centre for Blast Injury Studies (CBIS) is pleased to announce it?s 2015 Network Event to be held on the 24 th  November at Imperial College London. The event will be jointly hosted by the Trauma Initiative; a cross college programme between the South Kensington faculties of Engineering and Medicine and the Major Trauma Centre at St. Mary?s Hospital, Paddington. Please join us for an inspiring multidisciplinary programme of presentations covering the medical and technical aspects of military and civilian trauma care and research.
